summary: A lavish player home furnished in ancient Roman style.
descriptionHtml:
[size=16][color=#FF6600]Kapuwa...[/color][/size] 

[color=#33CC00][b]Requires:[/b][/color] Kapuwa Grass (It\'s in the download section too)

[b][color=#FFFF00]Recommended Mods:[/color][/b] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11370]Spouses can live everywhere[/url]

[u]This project started as a house for my character but I decided to share it with the  community because I\'m nice like that. 
   
The features of the home are listed below.[/u]
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/imageshare/images/360381-1335448839.jpg[/img]

[b][color=#FF9900]
The house contains a custom amory which can be accessed through a portal.[/color][/b]
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/imageshare/images/360381-1335449059.jpg[/img]

[b][color=#FF9900]There is a portal to blackreach (So you can mine ore)
[/color][/b]
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/imageshare/images/360381-1335449436.jpg[/img]

[b][color=#FF9900]A horse cart stands outside, the driver will take you where you please... for a price![/color][/b]
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/imageshare/images/360381-1335449647.jpg[/img]

[b][color=#FF9900]You can buy a spell from the guard outside, the spell will teleport you back to the house if you use it.
[/color][/b]
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/imageshare/images/360381-1335449871.jpg[/img]

[b][color=#FF9900]A warm... wet... Bath. [/color][/b]
[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/11566-1-1335450926.jpg[/img]

[b][color=#FF9900]Six companions from the tv show \"spartacus\" awaiting your commands (you should all watch that show)[/color][/b]
[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/11566-2-1335450930.jpg[/img]

[b][color=#FF9900]A companion with some *cough* extra tricks.[/color][/b]
[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/11566-3-1335450931.jpg[/img]

[b][color=#FF9900]The man sitting on the chair is a merchant, he deals with all sort of goods, stolen or not.[/color][/b]
[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/11566-4-1335450931.jpg[/img]

[b][color=#FF9900]There\'s a cook in the kitchen who sells and buys food. There\'s also a bard.[/color][/b]
[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/11566-5-1335450932.jpg[/img]

[b][color=#FF9900]Beautiful scenary in a lot of places, I tried to make the home as open as possible but still keep the coziness intact.[/color][/b]
[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/11566-1-1335451358.jpg[/img]

[b][color=#FF9900]
The entrance to the house is very close to riverwood, just across the river, next to that beautiful waterfall & stream.[/color][/b]
[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/11566-2-1335451360.jpg[/img]

[size=13][b][color=#FF0000]Some extra info - [/color][/b][/size]

[list][*] [color=#FF9900]I have tried to make it so that it never rains inside the house, to avoid the \"rain through roof\" bug. It seems to work for me so far.[/color]

[*] [color=#FF9900]I will not be adding any garden with every harvestable plant in the game, that\'s too much of a cheat and spoils adventuring.[/color]

[*] [color=#FF9900]When I have more free time, I [b]MIGHT[/b] make an arena/fightclub mod that will be connected to this mod.[/color]

[*] [color=#FF9900]I have yet to do any optimization for the house so it might require a strong computer, I don\'t have a weak machine so I can\'t really put that to the test.[/color][/list]

[size=13][b][color=#993399]_____________________[/color][/b][/size]

[color=#FF9900][b]Feel free to leave feedback, I will take a look at the comments once in a while and update the mod as necessary.[/b][/color]
 
[color=#33FF33][size=16][b]Endorse[/b][/size][/color] & [color=#CC33CC][b]Enjoy![/b][/color]
author: Chade91
